summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta) have announced aggressive increases in AI-focused Capex for 2024/2025, with commitments totaling in the tens of billions. GPU rental prices remain high ($3.41/hr), indicating sustained demand exceeding supply. Concurrently, major model releases (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5) and strong rumors of imminent launches (Gemini 2) signal ongoing innovation and market enthusiasm.
